statements: UPDATE ar_content_assets SET content_type = 'video' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE media_files SET file_name = 'New File Name', file_size = 1024, uploaded_at = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ar_content_assets SET category = 'New Category', updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE media_files SET file_name = 'New File Name', file_size = 1024, uploaded_at = '2022-05-10 14:30:00', asset_id = '876e4590-a43b-21c3-b456-426614174003' WHERE file_id = '456e1234-f15a-10b2-c345-612314157678';

UPDATE CampaignAssets SET position = 'Top Banner' WHERE asset_id = 2 AND campaign_id = 1;
